name: Brick Breaker King
description:
Brick Break Ball is a whole new Arkanoid adventure! Don't worry about losing ball. Just focus on the shoot angle and the bounce route. Deal damage to bricks, when the number decreased to 0. the brick breaks.

[How to play]
- Swipe to shoot balls to break the bricks.
- Get the green circle to increase the number of balls.
- Get the gold to buy different types of balls to break bricks
- When the bricks reach the bottom line, game is over.
- Challenge with your friends for high scores

Brick Break Ball is a classic breaking block game. Break and destroy each brick, much like classic Arkanoid.
But you don't be afraid losing ball just focus on breaking. You can make endless ball chain! Enjoy ingenious turn based arkanoid style game.

How long can you survive and
How many points can you get on this Brick Break Ball Game?
